nodes.text: Peter Thomas was one of the designers of the video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic, released in 2003 by BioWare. His writing was primarily for the characters Canderous Ordo and Juhani, and the locations Dantooine, Manaan, and the Unknown World. He is Canadian.

The 4th Annual Game Developers Choice Awards for the best games of 2003 recognized Knights of the Old Republic for "Excellence in Writing," specifically listing design team members Thomas, David Gaider, Drew Karpyshyn, and Luke Kristjanson as recipients. Karpyshyn thanked Thomas in the acknowledgments section of his 2007 novel Darth Bane: Path of Destruction.
